# 

Clever Secure Sync

[](#clever-secure-sync)

Clever Secure Sync lets you sync data from every SIS with one integration. Instead of building a separate connector for OneRoster files, PowerSchool, Aeries, Skyward, Infinite Campus, eSchoolPlus, and more, you can quickly provision accounts and use that time to improve your core product.

## 

Secure Sync

[](#secure-sync)

Secure Sync allows you to:

-   Access information about users and provision accounts in advance.
-   Access roster information such as student-teacher associations and classroom data.

Classroom-only applications have access to user information only when the user logs in through Instant Login (IL).

Not sure if Secure Sync is right for you? Reach out to [\[emailÂ protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a6c7d6d6cacfc5c7d2cfc9c88bcfc8d2c3d4c3d5d2e6c5cac3d0c3d488c5c9cb) and we'll get you in touch with our Application Partnerships team.

## 

Getting Started with Secure Sync

[](#getting-started-with-secure-sync)

First, check out [Clever's Data Model](/docs/data-model) to understand how data is organized in Clever. There are three major components to a solid Secure Sync integration:

1.  **Onboarding Districts**: Identifying the district-app token and preparing to ingest data.
2.  **Initial Sync**: Matching existing data and provisioning accounts for the first time.
3.  **Ongoing Sync**: Handling changes to data on an ongoing basis, including semester and school-year rollover.

We'll go over best practices for each of these pieces in the next three pages.
